title: Woman found dead at the home of 'Tarzan' star Ron Ely, suspect killed: reports
text:
CLOSE

Ron Ely as Tarzan (Photo: NBCU Photo Bank/NBCUniversal via Getty Images)

An elderly woman was reportedly found dead Tuesday night at the California home of former "Tarzan" actor Ron Ely.

NBC News and a local ABC affiliate report that police responded to a family disturbance call and discovered the woman's body at about 8:15 p.m. local time. The suspect was later killed in an officer-involved shooting.

The identities of the suspect and the woman have not been released. Ely, 81, best known for his titular role in the NBC series "Tarzan," was not injured, according to NBC.

USA TODAY has reached out to Ely's representative and the Santa Barbara County Sheriff's Office for more information.

"Tarzan" debuted in 1966 and ran for two seasons. Ely's most recent acting credit was in 2014 when he appeared in the Lifetime drama "Expecting Amish" opposite Jesse McCartney and Disney Channel alums Alyson Stoner and AJ Michalka, according to IMDB.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/celebrities/2019/10/16/tarzan-actor-ron-ely-woman-found-dead-his-home/3995079002/
description: An elderly woman was reportedly found dead Tuesday night at the California home of former "Tarzan" actor Ron Ely. Per outlets, the suspect is dead.
